sections.name: Gluttondark Babau

sources.name: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God

sections.html: This creature did not include a description.

sources.name: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God

link.name: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 23
link.alt: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 23

traits.name: Chaotic
traits.text: Chaotic effects often manipulate energy from chaos-aligned Outer Planes and are anathema to lawful divine servants or divine servants of lawful deities. A creature with this trait is chaotic in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Demon
traits.text: A family of fiends, demons hail from or trace their origins to the Abyss. Most are irredeemably chaotic evil and have darkvision.

traits.name: Fiend
traits.text: Creatures that hail from or have a strong connection to the evil-aligned planes are called fiends. Fiends can survive the basic environmental effects of planes in the Outer Sphere.

sources.name: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God

link.name: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 23
link.alt: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 23

automatic_abilities.name: Mercy Vulnerability
automatic_abilities.text: Babaus revel in the gore of a well-timed attack, and when brutal wounds are restored, they recoil in pain. When a creature heals from damage that the babau dealt on their last turn with Grievous Strike, sneak attack, or a critical hit, the demon takes 4d6 mental damage. The babau can take this mental damage only once per round.

automatic_abilities.name: Reactive Slime
automatic_abilities.trigger: A creature within the babau's reach successfully hits the babau with a Strike
automatic_abilities.effect: The babau excretes a gout of acidic, bloodlike slime against the attacker and its weapon. The attacker must attempt a DC 26 Reflex save.
automatic_abilities.critical_success: The attacker avoids the reactive slime.
automatic_abilities.critical_failure: As failure, except the weapon used to Strike the babau automatically becomes broken unless the weapon is made of a material that is immune to acid.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

ability.name: Grievous Strike

traits.name: Attack
traits.text: An ability with this trait involves an attack. For each attack you make beyond the first on your turn, you take a multiple attack penalty.

ability.text: The babau makes an attack with the intent of creating a particularly horrific and gory wound. It make a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, the babau deals an additional 1d6 damage and the creature struck is sickened 2 for 1 round; this sickened condition cannot be removed by retching.

ability.name: Sneak Attack
ability.text: A babau deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
